name: Mad Zomber
description:
The zombies took everything: your wife, your kids, your dog. You have nothing to live for, so you decide to end it by taking down all the zombies who ruined your life. You are MAD.

Controls (Keyboard/Xbox controller):

* WASD/Left stick: Walk

* Mouse/Right stick: Rotate camera

* Left click/B: Attack

* Left shift/Y: Move camera behind player

* M: Toggle music on/off
